Class Force

java.lang.Object
Force
Direct Known Subclasses:
Artillery, Infantry, Tank
public abstract class Force
extends java.lang.Object
Force class represents a force that player can use to attack the enemy.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Asma

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Force​(Location location)
    Create a new force at specific location.

    • move

      public Location move​(MovementDirections movementDirection, Location currentLocation)
      This method implements movement for force.
      Parameters:
      movementDirection - direction of the movement
      currentLocation - current location of the force
      Returns:
      new location after movements

    • setValidMovements

      protected abstract void setValidMovements()

    • returnForceType

      protected abstract java.lang.String returnForceType()
      Return force type. If it's a tank return T. If it's an Infantry return I. If it's an Artillery return A.
      Returns:
      force type

    • printInfo

      protected void printInfo()
      Print force info. Force type and group size.

    • printValidMovements

      protected abstract void printValidMovements()
      This method will print valid movements for every force. Valid movements: number of moves and attack ability

    • checkMovementsValidityForForce

      protected abstract boolean checkMovementsValidityForForce​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> forceMovements)
      This method checks the entered movements validity for the force.
      Parameters:
      forceMovements - movements that player has selected for the force.
      Returns:
      true if the selected movements are valid for the force

    • checkForSelectedTargetValidity

      protected abstract int checkForSelectedTargetValidity​(Location targetForceLocation)
      This method checks if the selected target location is in the appropriate distance from the attacker force.
      Parameters:
      targetForceLocation - location of the selected target force
      Returns:
      number of times that attacker can roll the dice
